content:
Based on the execution logs, here is the updated report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area at position(0,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at position(0,0) processing iron ore to iron plates
- Stone furnace at position(2,0) processing iron ore to iron plates

### Copper Plate Production Area at position(4,4)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position(4,4) processing copper ore to copper plates

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at position(9.5,11.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5,11.5) storing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at position(7.5,11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine 1 at position(9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5,11.5) moving finished circuits to output chest
- Output chest at position(12.5,11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System at position(-7,24.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5,24.5) pumping water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler (positions: -9.5/23.5, -8.5/23.5, -8.5/22.5, -7.5/22.5)
- Boiler at position(-7,24.5) generating steam
- Steam pipe network (positions: -5.5/24.5, -5.5/25.5, -5.5/26.5, -4.5/26.5, -3.5/26.5, -2.5/26.5)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Lab System at position(0.5,28.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(0.5,28.5)
- Burner inserter at position(0.5,30.5) feeding science packs
- Input chest at position(0.5,31.5) storing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Monitor coal levels in inventory before attempting to insert fuel into boilers and furnaces
- Harvest coal proactively before running out to prevent interruptions in power and smelting operations

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Electronic circuit production is stalling due to missing copper cable ingredients
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials to prevent production bottlenecks

### Power Distribution
- The electricity network appears stable with multiple connection points through small electric poles
- Current voltage level is 847416, indicating sufficient power generation
